00034     class GetValue {
00035     public:
00036         GetValue() { }
00037 
00038         GetValue(std::string v, bool s) {
00039             value = v;
00040             success = s;
00041         }
00042 
00043         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, GetValue &gv) {
00044             return o << "{GetValue success=" << gv.success
00045                      << ", value=\"" << gv.value << "\"}";
00046         }
00047 
00051         std::string value;
00055         bool success;
00056     };

00061     class KVStore {
00062     public:
00066         virtual void reset() {}
00067 
00073         virtual void noop(Callback<bool> &c) {
00074             bool t = true;
00075             c.callback(t);
00076         }
00077 
00085         virtual void set(std::string &key, std::string &val,
00086                          Callback<bool> &cb) = 0;
00087 
00094         virtual void get(std::string &key, Callback<GetValue> &cb) = 0;
00095 
00103         virtual void del(std::string &key, Callback<bool> &cb) = 0;
00104 
00109         virtual void begin() {}
00110 
00115         virtual void commit() {}
00116 
00121         virtual void rollback() {}
00122 
00123     };

00128     class AssertionError : public std::runtime_error {
00129     public:
00130         AssertionError(const char *s) : std::runtime_error(s) { }
00131         AssertionError(const std::string s) : std::runtime_error(s) { }
00132     };
00133 
00137     class Assertions {
00138     public:
00139         inline void assertTrue(bool v, std::string msg) {
00140             if(!v) {
00141                 throw AssertionError(msg);
00142             }
00143         }
00144 
00145         inline void assertFalse(bool v, std::string msg) {
00146             assertTrue(!v, msg);
00147         }
00148 
00149         inline void assertEquals(std::string s1, std::string s2) {
00150             assertTrue(s1.compare(s2) == 0, "failed string compare");
00151         }
00152 
00153         inline void assertEquals(int i1, int i2) {
00154             std::stringstream ss;
00155             ss << "Expected " << i1 << " got " << i2;
00156             assertTrue(i1 == i2, ss.str());
00157         }
00158 
00159         inline void assertNull(std::string *s) {
00160             if (s != NULL) {
00161                 std::string msg = "expected null, got ``" + *s + "''";
00162                 throw AssertionError(msg);
00163             }
00164         }
00165 
00166         inline void assertNotNull(std::string *s) {
00167             assertTrue(s != NULL, "expected nonnull");
00168         }
00169     };
00170 }
